content:
The avatar is currently at (7, 1). There are monsters around at (2, 1), (3, 1), (5, 3), (9, 3) and (12, 1).
There are boxes to collect at (2, 10), (2, 16), (2, 24), (12, 10), (12, 16), (12, 24).
Moving right seems like a good direction since there is no wall and a monster is on the left, and moving to the right will also let me explore the map.
Action: 2
I will move right, away from the monster on the left and hopefully find a box.

The avatar is at (7, 2). There are monsters at (2, 1), (3, 1), (5, 3), (9, 3), (12, 1). Boxes are at (2, 10), (2, 16), (2, 24), (12, 10), (12, 16), (12, 24). The goal is likely to avoid the monsters and collect boxes, though there's no clear indication of "safe" locations. Moving right seems like the safest bet to avoid the monster at (7, 3).
Action: 2
I will move right to avoid the monster. I expect to move to (7,3).

The avatar 'a' is at row=7, col=3.
There are boxes '@' at (2, 10), (2, 16), (2, 24), (12, 10), (12, 16), and (12, 24).
There are monsters '#' at (1, 1), (6, 3), (8, 3), (10, 3), and (12, 1).

The monster at (6, 3) is close. Move up to avoid it.
Action: 4
I will move up to avoid the monster.

The avatar is at (6, 3). There are monsters at (1, 1), (7, 3), (9, 3), (11, 3), (12, 1). There are boxes at (2, 10), (2, 16), (2, 24), (12, 10), (12, 16), (12, 24). The goal is to avoid the monsters and get the boxes. I will move down to avoid the monsters.
Action: 3
I expect the avatar to move down to row 7.
